posts.post_content: This is what Soulshift SHOULD have been. Simply making the rules "another Spirit" and the damned [6](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=50367), [7](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=74124), [8](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=50438) and even [9](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=74613) costed Soulshifters could have had their prices drastically reduced to match their actual power. Not simply a failed justification for a gimmick mechanic.
posts.html:
This is what Soulshift SHOULD have been. Simply making the rules "another Spirit" and the damned 6, 7, 8 and even 9 costed Soulshifters could have had their prices drastically reduced to match their actual power. Not simply a failed justification for a gimmick mechanic.
